d: This is Naomi's Wu's signature cargo skirt design.

backAttachmentDepth.d: Controls the depth of the back attachment.

backAttachmentFlapChamferSize.d: Controls the size of the chamfer on the back attachment flap.

backAttachmentWidth.d: Controls the width of the front attachment.

backPocketChamferSize.d: Controls the size of the chamfer on the back pocket.

backPocketDepth.d: Controls the depth of the back pockets.

beltloopWidth.d: Controls the width of the beltloops.

dartLength.d: Controls the length of the darts at the back.

dartWidth.d: Controls the width of the darts at the back.

flyLength.d: Controls the length of the fly.

flyWidth.d: Controls the width of the fly.

frontAttachmentChamferSize.d: Controls the size of the chamfer on the front attachment.

frontAttachmentWidth.d: Controls the width of the front attachment.

frontHalf.d: Controls the proportion of the skirt that will make up the front panel.

frontPocketOpeningBend.d: Controls the curvature of the front pocket opening.

frontPocketOpeningDepth.d: Controls the depth of the front pocket opening.

frontPocketOpeningWidth.d: Controls the width of the front pocket opening.

hipsEase.d: Controls the amount of ease at your hips.

jseamBend.d: Controls the curvature of the J-Seam, that J-shaped seam at the fly.

length.d: Controls the length of the skirt.

minDartWidth.d: Controls the minimal width below which darts will be ommitted in favor of shaping at the seams.

seatEase.d: Controls the amount of ease at your seat.

waistbandOverlap.d: Controls how much the waistband overlaps at the front closure.

waistbandWidth.d: Controls the width of the waistband.

waistSlant.d: Controls the slant of the waistband, how much the back is raised higher than the front.
